GS24paribhsu:3: natvāsāmbaṃ śivaṃ bramha nāgeśaḥ kurute sudhīḥ/
GS24paribhsu:5: prācīna vyakaraṇa tantre vācanikānyatra pāṇinīyatantre jñapakanyāyasiddāni bhaṣyavārtikayorupanibaddāni yāni paribhaṣārūpaṇi tāni vyākhyāsyante/
GS24paribhsu:10: viśeṣasyānyatarādyartharūpasya vyākhyānāt śiṣṭakṛtāt pratipattiḥ niśchayo yataḥ sandehācchāstramalakṣaṇamananuṣṭāpakaṃ lakṣaṇamalakṣaṇaṃ tathā na,
GS24paribhsu:14: pareṇeṇ grahaṇamiti laṇ sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭam // .1 //
GS24paribhsu:22: yatra deśe upadiśyate taddeśa eva vākyārtabodhena gṛhīta śaktyā gṛhītaparibhāṣārthena ca sarvatra śāstre vyavahāraḥ/
GS24paribhsu:24: tattadvākyārthabodhe jāte ' bhaviṣyati kiñcidanena prayojanam ' iti jñānamātreṇa santuṣyad yathāśrutagrāhipratipatrapekṣo 'yaṃ pakṣa īdūdetsūtre kaiyaṭaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:25_0: kecittu - paribhaṣāviṣaye tasminnityādi vākyārthabodhe saptamīnirdeśādikveti paryālocanāyāṃ
GS24paribhsu:29: yathā - 'pradīpaḥ suprajvalitaḥ sarvaṃ veśmābhijvalayati' iti 'ṣaṣṭīsthane' iti sūtre bhāṣya uktam/
GS24paribhsu:32: dīpo yathā - prabhādvārā sarvagṛhaprakāśaka evametatsvabuddhijananadvārā sarvaśāstropakārakamiti tattātparyam/
GS24paribhsu:35: tatraitāvān viśeṣaḥ - yatoddeśe parbhāṣādeśe sarvavidhisūtrabuddhāvātmabhedaṃ parikalpya tairekavākyatayā paribhāṣāṇām/
GS24paribhsu:39: atra ekadeśastha ityanena tatra tatra buddhāvapi taddeśasthatvaṃ vārayati,
GS24paribhsu:42: tadvanniṣedhavākyānāmapi niṣedhyaviśeṣākāṅkṣatvādvidhyekavākyatayaivānvaya iti paribhāṣāsādṛśyātparibhāṣātvena vyavahāraḥ 'kiṅiti ca' ityatra bhāṣye/
GS24paribhsu:43: tatraikavākyatā paryudāsena prasajya pratiṣedhe 'pi tena saha vākyārthabodhamātreṇaikavākyatā vyavahāraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:49: evaṃ tadbodhottarameva virodhapratisandhānañceti tatratyaparatvena vipratiṣedhasūtrapravṛttau bījam/
GS24paribhsu:50: ata eva kāryakālapakṣe“ayādibhyaḥ paraiva pragṛhya saṃjñā“iti 'adasomāt'
GS24paribhsu:52: ākaḍārādhikārasthabhapadasaṃjñāviśaye tu yathoddeśapakṣa eveti tatratyaparatvenaiva bādhyabhādhakabhāvaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:58: kāryakālamityasya ca kāryeṇa kālyate svasannidhiṃ prāpyata ityarthaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:60: ata eva 'pūrvatrāsiddham' iti sūtre bhāṣye tripādyā asiddhatvāttatra sapādasaptādyāyīstha paribhāṣāṇāṃ apravṛttimāśaṅkya yadyapīdaṃ tatrāsiddhaṃ tatviha siddhamityuktvā,
GS24paribhsu:61: tāvatāpyasiddhirityabhiprāyake kathamiti praśne-'kāryakālaṃ saṃjñāparibhāṣam' yatra kāryaṃ tatropasthitaṃ draṣṭavyamityuktam/
GS24paribhsu:62_0: na ca kāryakāla pakṣe 'ṅamo hrasvāt' ityadau ' tasmādityuttarasya' 'tasminnitinirdiṣṭe
GS24paribhsu:62_1: pūrvasya' iti paribhāṣādvayopasthitau paratvāt 'ubhayanirdeśe pañcamīnirdeśo balīyān'
GS24paribhsu:64: spaṣṭaṃ cedam 'ikoguṇa' ityatra kaiyaṭa iti vācyam ;
GS24paribhsu:68: nahi tatpakṣe 'pyacetanasya śāstrasya svadeśaṃ vihāya taddeśagamanaṃ sambhavati/
GS24paribhsu:70: ata eva bhāṣye tasminniti sūtre kaiyaṭaḥ - sūtra pāṭhāpekṣayā paratvasya vyavasathāpakatvamiti/
GS24paribhsu:72: anyathā sarvaśāstrāṇāṃ prayogārthatvena prayogarūpaikadeśastvena kvāpi paratvaṃ nasyāt/
GS24paribhsu:73: kiñca kiṅiti ceti sūtrastha kaiyaṭarītyā vidhisūtrāṇāṃ yathoddeśa pakṣe paribhāṣādeśe sannidhānena teṣāṃ paratvaṃ vyāhanyeta/
GS24paribhsu:74: evañca vṛkṣebhya ityatra supicetyataḥ paratvāt 'bahuvacane jhalyet' ityetvamityādyucchidyeta, ityalam//
GS24paribhsu:84: 'vuṇchaṇkaṭh' ityādau ṇitvaprayuktaṃ kāryaṃ pūrvasayaivetyādi tu vyākhyānate nirṇeyam/
GS24paribhsu:101: nanvekāntatve 'nekāltvādeva auśādīnāṃ sarvādeśatva siddhyā 'anekāl' sūtre śidgrahaṇaṃ vyarthamata āha -
GS24paribhsu:107: nanvevamapi 'avadātaṃ mukham' ityatra palopottaramātve kṛte 'dābiti ghusaṃjñāpratiṣedho na syāt,
GS24paribhsu:108: daipaḥ pakārasatve 'nejantatvāprāptyā palopottaraṃ pakārābhāvenāsya dāptvābhāvādata āha -
GS24paribhsu:121: tena 'godaḥ' ityādau nāṇiti 'vāsarūpa' sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭam//
GS24paribhsu:125: asti ca prakṛte bahvādīnāṃ saṅkhyāsaṃjñākṛteti jñānarūpaṃ prakaraṇam,
GS24paribhsu:131: na hi kṛtrimā saṅkhyā tyantā śadantā vāsti,
GS24paribhsu:132: tena 'kartari kartarikarmavyatihāre' 'kaṇvameghebhyaḥ karaṇe' 'vipratiṣiddhaṃ cānadhikaraṇe' ityādau laukikakriyādravyādyavagatiḥ/
GS24paribhsu:136: ata eva āmreḍita śabdena kṛtrimasyaiva grahaṇaṃ na tu dvistrirghuṣṭamātrasya/
GS24paribhsu:138: yattu - saṃjñāśāstrāṇāṃ macchāstre 'nena śabdenaita eveti niyamārthatvaṃ kṛtrimākṛtrima nyāyabījamiti/
GS24paribhsu:150: atra hi 'dvirvacane 'ci' iti nu śabdasya dvitvam,
GS24paribhsu:151: anyathā 'sanyaṅoḥ' ityasya ṣaṣṭyantatvātsannantasya kāryitvena iso dvitvanimittatvābhāvāttatpravṛttirna syāt/
GS24paribhsu:152: vastutaḥ - samavāyikāraṇa nimittakāraṇayorbhadasya sakalalokatantraprasiddhatayā tasya tatvenā'śrayaṇābhāvena naiṣā jñāpakasādhyā/
GS24paribhsu:154: sa hi tatvenānāśrayaṇe hetoḥ prasiddhatvaṃ dyotayatīti tatvam/
GS24paribhsu:156: nanu 'praṇidāpayati' ityādau dārūpasya vidhīyamānā ghusaṃjñā dāpernasyādata āha -
GS24paribhsu:160: sa tadguṇībhūtaḥ śāstreṇa tadavayavatvena bodhito 'tastadgrahaṇena tadgrāhakena tadbodhakena śabdhena gṛhyate bodhyata ityarthaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:162: loke 'pi devadattasyāṅgādhikye tadviśiṣṭasyaiva devadattagrahaṇena grahaṇaṃ dṛśyate/
GS24paribhsu:163: yamuddiśya vihita ityukteḥ 'pranidārayati' ityādau na dārityasya ghutvam/
GS24paribhsu:165: anyathā 'pacamānaḥ' ityādāvakārasya muki-anayā paribhāṣayā viśiṣṭasya savarṇadīrge tadvaiyarthyaṃ spaṣṭameva/
GS24paribhsu:167: 'jahāra' ityādau 'āta au ṇalaḥ' iti ca na/
GS24paribhsu:172_0: 'āne muk' iti sūtra bhāṣye 'kārasyāṅgāvayavasya mugityarthe 'pacamānaḥ' ityatra 'tāsyanudāttet'
GS24paribhsu:173_0: kiñca ṅamantapadāvayavasya hrasvātparasya ṅamo ṅamuḍityarthe 'kurvannāste' ityādau
GS24paribhsu:173_1: ṅamo ṅamuḍāgame ṇatvaprāptimāśaṅkya 'yadāgamāḥ' iti nyāyenādyanasyāpi padāntagrahaṇena
GS24paribhsu:176: anyathā 'ṛkārasya guṇavṛddhī arārāveva' iti niyamo na syāt/
GS24paribhsu:178: ata eva 'radābhyāṃ' iti sūtre bhāṣyam -“guṇo bhavati,
GS24paribhsu:182: 'anāgamakānāṃ sāgamakāḥ ādeśāḥ' ityasya tvayamarthaḥ - ārdhadhātukasyeḍāgama ityarthe jñāte,
GS24paribhsu:188: sthānivadbhāvaviṣaye 'nirdiśyamānasya' iti paribhāṣāyāḥ pravṛttau 'tisṛṇām' itiyatira paratvāttisrādeśe sthānivadbhāvena trayādeśamāśaṅkhya,
GS24paribhsu:190: 'eruḥ' ityādau sthānaṣaṣṭīnārdeśāttadantaparatayā paṭhitavākyasyaiva samudāyādeśaparatvenā'deśagrahaṇasāmarthyāttasya sthānivatsūtre grahaṇena na doṣaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:191: ānumānika sathānyādeśabhāvakalpane 'pi śrautasthānyādeśabhāvasya na tyāga iti 'acaḥ parasmin' ityādernāsaṅgatiḥ/
GS24paribhsu:194: nanvevam udasthādityādau 'udaḥsthāstambhoḥ pūrvasya' iti pūrvasavarṇāpattirata āha -
GS24paribhsu:205: kiṅca 'na bhūsudhiyoḥ' iti niṣedhena grahaṇakaśāstragṛhītānāṃ nirdiśyamākāryabodhānna doṣaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:208: etenedaṃ ṅitvaṃ varṇagrahaṇe nirdiśyamāna paribhāṣāyā apravṛttijñāpakamityapāstam/
GS24paribhsu:213: anayā paribhāṣayā 'yenavidhiḥ' iti sūtrabodhitatadantasya sathānivatvābhāva bodhanam,
GS24paribhsu:216: anayā ca svasvanimittasannidhāpitānām 'alo 'ntyasya' ityādīnāṃ samāveśa eva,
GS24paribhsu:221: 'anekāl śit' iti sūtre sarvaścaitatparibhāṣābodhita eva gṛhyate/
GS24paribhsu:223: 'udaḥsthāt' iti sūtraviṣaye 'syāḥ 'pādaḥ pat' iti sūtre bhāṣye sañcāritatvāt/
GS24paribhsu:233: 'pādaḥ pat' iti sūtre 'ṣaṣṭī sthāne' iti sūtre ca bhāṣye ca spaṣṭaiṣā//
GS24paribhsu:234: nanu 'cetā' ityādau hrasvasyekārasya pramāṇata āntaryādakāro 'pi syādata āha-
GS24paribhsu:236: yatrānekavidhamāntaryaṃ tatra sthanata āntaryaṃ balīyaḥ // Paribh_12 //
GS24paribhsu:238: atra mānam 'ṣaṣṭī sthāne' ityata ekadeśānuvṛtyā sthāne grahaṇe 'nuvartamāne punaḥ 'sthānentaratamaḥ' iti sūtre sthāne grahaṇameva/
GS24paribhsu:239: taddhi tṛtīyayā vipariṇamya vākyabhedena sthāninaḥ prasaṅge jāyamānaḥ sati sambhave sthānata evāntaratama ityarthakam/
GS24paribhsu:244: arthataḥ 'paddanno' ityādau sthānyarthābhidhāna samarthasyaivā'deśateti siddhāntādyadarthābhidhānasamartho yaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:254: upasthitārthasya śabdaṃ prati viśeṣaṇatayānvayasambhave tyāge mānābhāvo 'syā mūlam/
GS24paribhsu:255: atrārthaḥ kalpitānvayavyatirekakalpitaḥ śāstrīyo 'pi gṛhyate iti 'saṅkhyāyāḥ' iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭam/
GS24paribhsu:256: iyaṃ varṇa grahaṇeṣu neti 'lasya' ityatra bhāṣye spaṣṭam/
GS24paribhsu:258: etanmūlakameva 'yena vidhiḥ' ityatra bhāṣye paṭhyate 'alaivānarthakena tadantavidhiḥ' iti/
GS24paribhsu:259: kiñca 'svaṃ rūpam' iti śāstre svaśabdenā'tmīyavācinār'tho gṛhyate,
GS24paribhsu:273: gauṇe hyarthe śabdaḥ prayujyamāno mukhārthāropeṇa pravarthate/
GS24paribhsu:278: kintūpāttaṃ viśiṣyārthopasthāpakaṃ viśiṣṭarūpaṃ yatra tādṛśapadakārya eva/
GS24paribhsu:283: nipātapadaṃ tu cāditvenaiva cādīnāmupasthāpakamiti taduddeśyakakāryanidhāyake 'ot' ityādāvetatpravṛt 'gobhavattyā' ityādau doṣo na/
GS24paribhsu:284: 'agnīṣomau māṇavakau' ityatra prasiddhadevatādvandvavācyagnīṣomapadasya tatsadṛśaparatve 'pyantaraṅgatvādītvaṣatve bhavata eva/
GS24paribhsu:288: ata eva 'agnisomau māṇavako' ityatra gauṇamukhyanyāyena śatvavāraṇaparam,
GS24paribhsu:290_0: 'gāṃ pāṭhaya' ityādau mukhya gopadārthasya pāṭhanakarmatvāsambhavena nibhaktyutpattivelāyāṃ
GS24paribhsu:292: 'tvadbhavatiṭha ityādi bhāśyaprayoge tvādyādeśadīrgādīnāṃ karaṇena cāsya nyāyasya padakāryaviṣayatvamevocitam/
GS24paribhsu:294: kiñca“śuklām' ityukte karma nirdiṣṭam kartā kriyācānirdiṣṭe“ityādyuktyā 'ihedānīṃ gāmabhyāja kṛṣṇāṃ devadattetyādau sarvaṃ nirdiṣṭam,
GS24paribhsu:297_1: prasakte niyamārthaḥ kriyāvācakādiprayoga ityetattātparyakeṇa sāmānyataḥ kriyājanyaphalāśrayatvamātravivakṣāyāṃ
GS24paribhsu:297_2: dvitīyādīnāṃ sādhutvānvākhyānamityarthalābhena pāṭhanakriyānvayakāle padasyaiva gauṇarthatvapratītiḥ prayokturapi /
GS24paribhsu:299: dhvanitaṃ cedam 'sarvādīni' iti sūtre saṃjñābhūtānāṃ pratiṣedhamārabhatā vārttikakṛtā,
GS24paribhsu:303: śabdāśraye ca vṛddhyātve-iti 'ot' sūtrastha bhāṣyasya laukikārthavatvayogyapadāśraya
GS24paribhsu:304: eṣa nyāyaḥ, tadrahitaśabdāśraye ca te ityarthaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:309: aninasmingrahaṇānyarthavatā cānarthakena ca tadantavidhiṃ prayojayanti // Paribh_15 //
GS24paribhsu:310: 'yena vidhiḥ' ityatra bhāṣye vacana rūpeṇa paṭhitaiṣā/
GS24paribhsu:315: anye tu 'parivīviṣīdhvam' ityatra ḍhatvavyāvṛttaye kriyamāṇāt 'iṇaḥ ṣīdhvam' ityatrāṅgagrahaṇādarthavatparibhāṣānityā,
GS24paribhsu:317: 'vibhāṣeṭaḥ' ityatrānarthakasyaiva ṣīdhvamaḥ sambhavādatrāpi tasyaiva grahaṇamiti bhramavāraṇāya 'aṅgāt' iti pare//
GS24paribhsu:321: ekayoganirdiṣṭānāṃ saha vā pravṛttiḥ saha vā nivṛttiḥ // Paribh_16 //
GS24paribhsu:324: ekakārya niyuktānāṃ bahūnāṃ loke tathaiva darśanāditi bhāvaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:325: yattu-atra jñāpakam 'neḍvaśi' ityata iḍityanuvartamāne 'ārdhadhātukasyeḍ' ityatra punariḍgrahaṇam/
GS24paribhsu:327: tanna ; 'dīdhīvevīṭām' iti sūtre bhāṣye tatratyeḍgrahaṇapratyākhyānāyeḍ grahaṇe 'nuvartamāne punariḍgrahaṇasyeṭo guṇarūpavikārārthakatvasyoktatvena tadvirodhāt/
GS24paribhsu:328: naño nivṛttistu 'kvacidekadeśo 'pi anuvartate' iti nyāyena siddhā/
GS24paribhsu:330: 'ārdhadhātukasya' iti sūtrastheḍgrahaṇasya 'neḍvaśi' iti sūtre bhāṣye pratyākhyānāt,
GS24paribhsu:335: tathā 'dāmahāyanāntācca' ityādau 'saṅkhyāvyayādeḥ' ityataḥ saṅkhyāderityanuvartate 'vyayāderiti nivṛttamiti cānupapannamata āha-
GS24paribhsu:338: ekārthe yogaḥusambandhastena nirdiṣṭayoḥ samudāyābhidhāyidvandvanirdiṣṭayorityartha iti 'pakṣāttiḥ' iti sūtre kaiyaṭaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:340: spaṣṭā ceyam 'dāmahāyanāntācca' iti sūtre 'auto 'mśasoḥ' iti sūtre ca bhāṣye pūrvā ca//
GS24paribhsu:349: 'evaṃ tarhi siddhe yadapratyaya iti pratiṣedhaṃ śāsti,
GS24paribhsu:350: tajjñāpayati bhavatyeṣāparibhāṣā 'bhāvyamānena savarṇānāṃ grahaṇaṃ na' iti/
GS24paribhsu:351: kiñca, 'jyāda īyasaḥ' ityevāntaryato dīrghe siddhe 'jyādāt' iti dīrgoccāraṇamasyā jñāpakam/
GS24paribhsu:352: aṇuditsūtre 'jyādāt' iti sūtre ca bhāṣye spaṣṭaiṣā/
GS24paribhsu:357: nanvevam 'adaso 'seḥ' ityādinā 'amū' ityādau dīrgavidhānaṃ na syādata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:362: nanu 'gave hitaṃ gohitam' ityādau pratyayalakṣaṇenāvādyādeśāpattirata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:366: tatvaṃ ca 'pratyayalope' iti sūtre sthānivadityanuvṛtyaiva siddhe pratyayalakṣaṇagrahaṇaṃ pratyayetarāviśeṣaṇatvarūpaṃ yatra prādhānyaṃ tatraiva pravṛtyarthametatsiddham/
GS24paribhsu:369: 'citrāyāṃ jātā citrā' ityādāvaṇyo 'kārastadantān ṅīp ca na/
GS24paribhsu:371: nanu 'ataḥ kṛkami' ityatra kami grahaṇe siddhe,
GS24paribhsu:392: tat, na ; 'iyān' ityādau tasya tādṛśasamudāyena vyabhicāreṇākṣepasambhavāt/
GS24paribhsu:411: yena vidhiriti sūtre bhāṣya etadghaṭakatadantāṃśasyāpavādaḥ paṭhyate :-
GS24paribhsu:418: tadantetyaṃśānupasthitāvapi tadādītyaṃśasyopasthitau repha-dāntātparasya niṣṭātasyetyartha iti na doṣaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:420: tadantāṃśopasthitau tūbhayorekaniṣayatvameva syāditi 'dṛṣattīrṇaḥ' ityādau doṣaḥ syādeva/
GS24paribhsu:424: tatra kasmāditi niyatāvadhyākāṅkṣāyā abhāvena pañcamyantasya pratyayaviśeṣaṇatvābhāvāt/
GS24paribhsu:425: aṅga saṃjñā sūtre tu tadādeḥ pratyaye para ityarthe pañcamyantasya viśeṣaṇatvaṃ spaṣṭameva/
GS24paribhsu:427: nanvevam 'kumārī brāmhaṇīrūpā' ityādau 'gharūpa' iti hrasvāpattirata āha:-
GS24paribhsu:433: iyaṃ ca 'hṛdayasya' iti sūtra eva bhāṣye spaṣṭā//
GS24paribhsu:439: yaḥ strīpratyayaḥ striyaṃ prādhānyenā'ha tatra tadādiniyamo na,
GS24paribhsu:442: tena 'atirājakumāriḥ' ityādau rājakumārīśabdārthasyātiśabdārthaṃ pratyupasarjanatve 'pi tadarthaṃ pratyanupasarjanatvāt tadādāniyamābhāvena hrasva siddhiḥ/
GS24paribhsu:452: nanvevam“taraptamapau ghaḥ“ityādinā tarabantādeḥ saṃjñā syādata āha:-
GS24paribhsu:456: na ca pratyayayoḥ padasaṃjñāyāmapi pratyayagrahaṇaparibhāṣayā tadantagrahaṇābhāvāt jñāpite 'pi phalābhāva iti vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:457: padasaṃjñāyāḥ 'svādiṣu' iti viṣaye prakṛti niṣṭatayā padagrahaṇasya pratyayamātragrahaṇatvābhāvāt/
GS24paribhsu:459: nanu 'avatapte nakulasthitam' ityādau nakulasthita śabdasya ktāntatvābhāvāt samāso na syādata āha:-
GS24paribhsu:462: asyāśca karmaṇi ktānta uttarapade 'nantaro gatiḥ prakṛtisvara ityarthake 'gatiranantaraḥ' iti sūtre anantara grahaṇaṃ jñāpakam/
GS24paribhsu:466: na ca 'abhyuddhṛtam' ityādau paratvāt 'gatirgatau' ityanenābhernighāta eveti vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:469: anantaragrahaṇe kṛtetu tatsāmartyād gatyākṣiptadhātunirūpitamevenantaryaṃ gṛhyata iti na doṣaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:470: na ca 'abhyuddhṛtam' ityādāvabhinā samāse 'nantarasyodaḥ pūrvapadatvābhāve 'pi svarārthaṃ taditi vācyam/
GS24paribhsu:471: 'kārakād datta' iti sūtre 'kārakāt' iti yogaṃ vibhajya tatra gati grahaṇamanuvartya kārakādeva paraṃ gatipūrvapadaṃ
GS24paribhsu:474: yatra gatikārakasamabhivyāhṛtaṃ kṛdantaṃ tatra kṛdgrahaṇe tadviśiṣṭasyaiva grahaṇam/ 'api'
GS24paribhsu:476: anyathānayā kṛdgrahaṇaviṣaye paratvāt 'pratyayagrahaṇa' paribhāṣāyā bādha eva syādityapi grahaṇam/
GS24paribhsu:477: ata eva 'sāṅkūṭinam' iti 'gatikārakopapadānām' iti 'kṛdgrahaṇa' iti ca paribhāṣābhyāṃ kṛdantena samāse kṛte viśiṣṭādevāṇi siddhyati,
GS24paribhsu:478: na tu 'saṅkauṭinam' iti 'puṃyogāt' iti sūtre bhāṣyoktaṃ saṅgacchate anyathā tatra kevalakūṭinnityetasyāpīnuṇantatvāttato 'ṇi pākṣikadoṣo durvāra eva syāt/
GS24paribhsu:480: 'gatiranantaraḥ' ityatra tu gateḥ pūrvapadasya ktānta uttarapade pare kāryavidhānāttatsamavadhāne 'pi kevalasya ktāntatvena grahaṇaṃ bodhyam/
GS24paribhsu:485: padāṅgādhikāre tasya ca tadantasya ca // Paribh_28 //
GS24paribhsu:486: padamaṅgaṃ ca viśeṣyaṃ viśeṣaṇena ca tadanta vidhiḥ/
GS24paribhsu:493: ata eva 'taduttarapadasya' iti pāṭho 'yukta iti bhāṣye spaṣṭam/
GS24paribhsu:499: nanvevam 'asyāpatyamiḥ' ityādāvadantaprātipadikābhāvādiñ na syāt, ata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:502: nimittasadbhāvāt viśiṣṭo 'padeśo mukhyo vyavahāro yasyāsti sa vyapadeśī/
GS24paribhsu:510: ata eva 'hariṣu' ityādau soḥ padatvaṃ na/
GS24paribhsu:511: loke 'pi bahuputrasatve naikasmin jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhatvādivyavahāro 'yaṃ me jyeṣṭhaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:523: tasya 'ekapadā ṛk' ityatra bhāṣyoktarītyā mukhyavyavahāra satvāt/
GS24paribhsu:526: ṛktvāderarthaśabdobhayavṛttitvena tasyāḥ śabdamātrarūpaṃ padameko 'vayava ityartha iti tadāśayaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:528: yathā ca 'śilāputrakasya śarūram' ityādevekasminnaropitānekakāvasthābhiḥ samudāyarūpatvādyāropeṇaitasya śarūramityādivyavahāraḥ,
GS24paribhsu:532: śapamādāyāṅgatve kārye yasmādvihitastadāditvetasya sasahāyatvābhāvālloke vijātīyakanyādisatve 'pyekaputrasya tasminnevayameva jyeṣṭha ityādivyavahāravat/
GS24paribhsu:533: na caivam 'nijau catvāra ekācaḥ' iti bhāṣyāsaṅgatiḥ,
GS24paribhsu:537: arthabodhakena śabdena vyapadeśisadṛśo bhāvaḥ kāryaṃ labhyata iti tadarthaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:540: ādiryasyeti vyavahāre cāsahāya eveti tatra vyapadeśivadbhāvena ṭisaṃjñāsiddhirityanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:541: nanu gargādibhyo vihita yañ tadanta vidhinā paramagargādibhyo 'pi syāt, ata āha:-
GS24paribhsu:544: iyaṃ ca 'samāsapratyayavidhau pratiṣedha ugidvarṇagrahaṇavarjam' iti vārtikasthapratyayāṃśānuvādaḥ/ ata eva
GS24paribhsu:545: 'yena vidhiḥ' iti sūtra bhāṣye pratyayavidhibhinne“aptṛn“ityādau gṛhyamāṇaprātipadikenāpi tadanta vidhipratipādanam 'svasā,
GS24paribhsu:547: ata eva ca tadantavidhisūtre bhāṣye samāsetyādiniṣedhasya kathanavadasya na kathanam/
GS24paribhsu:548: so 'pi niṣedho viśiṣya tattadrūpeṇa gṛhītaprātipadikasūtra eva/
GS24paribhsu:553: nanvevam“sūtrāntāṭṭhak” “daśāntāḍḍaḥ” “ekagopūrvāt“ityādeḥ kevala sūtraśabda daśanśabdaikaśabdādiṣvapi pravṛttirvyapadeśivadbhāvāt syāt, ata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:567: tena“ugitaśca“ityatra na doṣa iti tatraiva bhāṣye spaṣṭam/
GS24paribhsu:568: iyam 'grahaṇavatā' iti ca paribhāṣā prātyayavidhiviṣayaiveti 'asamāse niṣkādibhyaḥ'iti sūtra bhāṣyakaiyaṭayoḥ/
GS24paribhsu:569: tena 'ahan' ityādeḥ paramāhanśabde kevalāhanśabde ca pravṛttirityanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:570: nanu 'vānto yi' ityādau yādau pratyaya ityarthaḥ katham? ata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:576: ata eva“neḍvaśi kṛti“ityādau vaśādeḥ kṛta ityādyarthalābhaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:577: iyaṃ ca“ārdhadhātukasyeḍ“iti sūtre valāderityādigrahaṇasāmarthyād viśeṣyaviśeṣaṇayorubhayoḥ saptamyantatva eva pravartate/
GS24paribhsu:578: tena“ḍaḥ si dhuṭ“ityādau sādeḥ parasyeti nārthaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:586: “cārthe dvandvaḥ“iti sūtreṇa samāhāretarayogayoraviśeṣeṇa dvandva vidhānāt nyāyasiddheyam/
GS24paribhsu:589: na caivamapyatra“jātiraprāṇinām“iti nityaikavadbhāvena bahuvacanābhāvādidaṃ sūtraṃ vyarthamiti vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:594: ata eva“dvandvaśca prāṇī“ityādeḥ prāṇyaṅgādīnāmeva samāhāra iti viparītaniyamo na //
GS24paribhsu:597: “vyatyayo bahulam“iti sūtre bhāṣye bahulamiti yogavibhāgena“ṣaṣṭhīyuktaśchandasi“iti sūtre veti yogavibhāgena caiṣā sādhitā/
GS24paribhsu:600: nanu kṣiya ityādāviyaṅ katham? ata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:604: tatreva prātipadikatva nibandhana vibhaktikaraṇādanityā ceyamiti“kṣiyo dīrghāt“ita sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭam//
GS24paribhsu:605: nanu“rāmau“ityādau vṛddhau kṛtāyāṃ kāryakāla pakṣe kathaṃ padatvam?
GS24paribhsu:612: anyathā śaktatāvacchedakaimupūrvyajñānāt tato bodho na syāt/
GS24paribhsu:616: chinnapucche śuni śvatvavyavacahāravanmānte tatvaṃ lokanyāya siddham/
GS24paribhsu:621: etenāyaṃ nyāyaḥ śāstrīyakārya eva śāstrīvikāra evetyapāstam/
GS24paribhsu:628: tatra jātivyañjakabhūyo 'vayavadarśanābhāvena tatvāpratītau kāryasidhyarthaṃ vikṛtānalrūpāvayavatvapratītyarthaṃ ca“sathānivat“sūtram/
GS24paribhsu:631: spaṣṭaṃ ca kvacinnyāyāpravṛttiḥ“prathamayoḥ pūrvasavarṇaḥ“ityatra kaiyaṭena darśitetyanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:640: nanvevam 'bhindhi' ityatra paratvāt tātaṅā bādhito dhirna syādata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:643: nanvevam 'tisṛṇām' ityatra paratvāt tisrādeśe punastrayādeśaḥ syādata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:645: sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe yad bādhitaṃ tad bādhitameva // Paribh_39 //
GS24paribhsu:646: tatra kvaciccaritārthayorekasmin yugapadubhayoḥ kāryayorasambhavena bādhakābhāvāt paryāyeṇa tṛjādivacchāstra
GS24paribhsu:650: yadā tamubhau yugapat preṣayato nānādikṣu ca kārye tadobhayorna karoti,
GS24paribhsu:652: tathā śāstrayorlakṣyārthayoḥ kvacillakṣye yaugapadyena pravṛtyasambhavādapratipattau praptāyāmidaṃ paravidhyartham/
GS24paribhsu:654: tarhi tadapi bhavatyeveti 'punaḥ prasaṅgavijñāna' siddhiriti“vipratiṣedha“sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭam/
GS24paribhsu:655_0: yattu kaiyaṭādayo vyaktau padārthe pratilakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇopaplavādubhayorapi śāstrayostattallakṣyayoracaritārthyena
GS24paribhsu:655_1: paryāyeṇa dvayorapi prāptau parameveti niyamārthamidamiti 'sakṛdgati' nyāyasiddhiḥ /
GS24paribhsu:657_0: jātipakṣe tūddeśyatāvacchedakākrānte kvacillakṣye caritārthayordvayoḥ śāstrayoḥ satpratipakṣanyāyena
GS24paribhsu:658: tanna ; vyaktipakṣe sarvaṃ lakṣyaṃ śāstraṃ vyāpnoti na jātipakṣa ityatra mānābhāvāt/
GS24paribhsu:659: 'na brāhmaṇaṃ hanyāt' ityādau jātyāśrayasakalavyaktiviṣayatvārthameva jātipakṣāśrayaṇasya bhāṣye darśanāt/
GS24paribhsu:660: ata eva“sarūpa“sūtre bhaṣye jātau padārthe 'navayavena sākalyena vidhipravṛtteḥ“gauranubandhyaḥ“ityādau sakala gavānubandhanāsambhavāt karmaṇo vaiguṇyamuktam/
GS24paribhsu:662: kiñca nahi bhāṣyokta tṛjādidṛṣṭāntasya vyaktivakṣa eva sarva viṣayatvam na dātipakṣa ityatra mānamasti/
GS24paribhsu:663: api ca vyaktipakṣe 'pyanyavyaktirūpa viṣayalābhena caritārthayoriyaṃ vyaktivirodhāt svaviṣayakatvaṃ na
GS24paribhsu:669: kvacillaukikadṛṣṭāntāśrayaṇamiti bhāṣyasammata mārga eva yukta iti bodhyam/
GS24paribhsu:682: kvacidiṣṭānurodhena pūrvaśāstre svaritatvapratijñābalāt svaritenādhikaṃ kāryamityarthāt pūrvameva bhavati/
GS24paribhsu:683: tena sarve pūrva vipratiṣedhāḥ saṅgṛhītā iti“svaritena“iti sūtre bhāṣye/
GS24paribhsu:690: atra“vṛdbhyaḥ syasanoḥ“iti sūtreṇa sye vibhāṣātaṅvidhānaṃ jñāpakam/
GS24paribhsu:691: anyathā svavyavadhāne niyamāpravṛttau sāmānya śāstreṇobhayasiddhau vikalpavidhānaṃ vyarthaṃ syāt/
GS24paribhsu:692: atrārthe jñapite tu 'sya' iti tatra viṣayasaptamī bodyeti“anudāttaṅitaḥ“ityatra bhāṣyakaiyaṭayoḥ spaṣṭam/
GS24paribhsu:693: vikaraṇavyavadhāne 'pi niyamapravṛtteridaṃ jñapakamiti“śadeḥ śitaḥ“ityatra bhāṣye dhvanitam/
GS24paribhsu:700: lakāraviśeṣāpekṣatvāt syādayo bahiraṅgā iti digyogalakṣaṇapañcamyāmapi na doṣaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:701: atra pakṣe“vṛdbhyaḥ syasanoḥ“iti sūtraṃ syaviṣaya iti vyākhyayam/
GS24paribhsu:703: bhinnavākyatayā sāmānya śāstravihitānāṃ niyame tu lugādineva niyamena jātinivṛttiraṅgīkāryā/
GS24paribhsu:705: kiṃ tena kṛtaṃ syāt“iti nyāyastu nātra śāstra āśrayituṃ yuktaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:709: sāmānyaśāstreṇotpattistu sarūpasūtrasttha kaiyaṭa rītyā pradhānānurodhena guṇabhedakalpanā tāvatprakṛti kalpanayā kāryā,
GS24paribhsu:710: pratyayanivṛttau ca tatkalpitaprakṛterapi nivṛttiḥ kalpyeti gauravamityanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:720: ata eva 'tudati' ityādau parādapi guṇānnityatvāt śapratyayādirbhavati//
GS24paribhsu:725: idaṃ 'śadeḥ śitaḥ' iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭam/
GS24paribhsu:726: tatra hi 'nyaviśata' ityatra vikaraṇe kṛte tadantasyāḍ,
GS24paribhsu:735: yadā tu śāstravyatirekeṇa tadvidheyakāryayoreva nityatvādi vicāro yadāpi vyaktiviśeṣāśrayaṇābhāvaḥ, tadāha :-
GS24paribhsu:738: kṛte dvitīye nityatvenābhimatasya punaḥ prasaṅgamātraṃ nityatvavyavahāre prayojakam,
GS24paribhsu:739: na tu bādhakābādhita phalopahita prasaṅgo 'pi tatheti bhāvaḥ//
GS24paribhsu:742: yasya ca lakṣaṇāntareṇa nimittaṃ vihanyate na tadanityam // Paribh_47 //
GS24paribhsu:743: kvacittu bādhakābādhita phalopahita prasaṅga eva gṛhyate tadāha :-
GS24paribhsu:745: yasya ca lakṣaṇāntareṇa nimittaṃ vihanyate tadapyanityam // Paribh_48/./
GS24paribhsu:747: vālisugrīvayoryudhyamānayorbhagavatā vālini hate 'pi sugrīvasya vālitaḥ prābalyaṃ na vyavaharanti,
GS24paribhsu:748: bhagavatsahāyaiḥ pāṇḍavairjaye labdhepi pāṇḍavānāṃ prābalyaṃ vyavaharanti ceti
GS24paribhsu:754: yatra tvekasyaiva kāryasya paratvaṃ nityatvaṃ ca,
GS24paribhsu:756: ata eva tatra paratvānnityatvācceti bhāṣye ucyate/
GS24paribhsu:759: “ṇaucaṅi“iti hrasvāpekṣayā nityatvāntaraṅgatvaprayuktadvitvasya prathamataḥ pravṛttau nityatvādityeva bhāṣya uktam/
GS24paribhsu:776: ata eva 'trayādeśe srantasya pratiṣedhaḥ' iti“sthānivat“sūtrastha bhāṣyavārtikādi saṅgacchate/
GS24paribhsu:778: 'paceran' ityādāveyādīnāmaṅgasaṃjñāsāpekṣatvena bahiraṅgatayāsiddhatvād valilopo na syāditi parāstam/
GS24paribhsu:784: na śabdhamāśritya guṇa ityantaraṅgatvād guṇa eva syādityuktam/
GS24paribhsu:786: siverbāhulakādauṇādike na pratyaye guṇavalopoṭhāṃ prasaṅge ūṭhapavādatvād valopaṃ bādhate,
GS24paribhsu:790: tatra kṛte yaṇ guṇau prapnuta iti/
GS24paribhsu:792: na ; tadantavidhāvapi bahupadārthāpekṣatvarūpa bahiraṅgatvasya guṇe satvena tatra doṣakathanaparabhāṣyāsaṅgateḥ/
GS24paribhsu:803: vali lope 'ntaraṅgaparibhāṣā na pravartata iti tu na yuktam/
GS24paribhsu:807: yattu nalopasya ṣaṭsaṃjñāyāmasiddhatvāt 'pañca' ityatra“na ṣaṭ“iti niṣedha iti,
GS24paribhsu:818: paramparayā nimittatvamādāya bahiraṅgatvāśrayaṇaṃ tu na mānam/
GS24paribhsu:821: antaraṅge kartavye jātaṃ tatkālaprāptikaṃ ca bahiraṅgamasiddhamityarthaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:822: vraścādiṣu padasaṃskāra pakṣe samānakālatvameva dvayoriti bodhyam/
GS24paribhsu:829: anyathā samprasāraṇamātravidhānena laghūpadhaguṇe“vṛddhi reci“iti vṛddhau 'viśvauhaḥ' ityādisiddhestadvaiyarthyaṃ spaṣṭameva/
GS24paribhsu:832: ata eva 'bhinatti' ityādau na guṇaḥ/ evaṃ
GS24paribhsu:835: “puganta“ityādau karmadhārayāśrayaṇena pratyayaparāṅgāvayavalaghūpadhārūpeko guṇa iti“ikoguṇavṛddhī“iti sūtra bhāṣya
GS24paribhsu:846: na cānayā pūrvasyāsiddhatvādabhāvena taṃ prati parāsiddhatvaṃ pūrvatretyanena vaktumaśakyamiti vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:848: kiñca pūrvatretyasya pratyakṣatvena tenānumānikyā asyā bādha evocitaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:849: ataḥ kāryakāla pakṣamevopakramyoktayuktīruktvā“ato 'yukto 'yaṃ parihāro na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt“ityuktaṃ visarjanīyasūtrabhāṣye siddhāntinā/
GS24paribhsu:850: tripādīsthe 'ntaraṅge kartavye parihāro na yukta iti tadarthaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:852: ata eva“nigālyate“ityādau latvārtham 'tasya doṣaḥ' iti vacanamevārabdham/
GS24paribhsu:858: taddhi“khaṭvā ā ūḍhaḥ“ityatra paramapi savarṇadīrghaṃ bādhitvāntaraṅgatvād guṇe kṛte vṛddhiprāptau pararūpārtham/
GS24paribhsu:859: sādhanabodhakapratyayotpatyanantaraṃ pūrvaṃ dhātorupasargayoge paścāt 'khaṭvā' śabdasya samudāyena yogāt guṇasyāntaraṅgatvamiti“samprasāraṇācca“iti sūtre bhāṣye
GS24paribhsu:867: ata eva 'anubhūyate' ityādau sakarmakatvāt karmaṇi lakāra siddhiḥ' iti tanna,
GS24paribhsu:869: bodhāt, sādhyasya ca sādhanākāṅkṣatayā tatsambandhottarameva niścitakriyā bodhena sādhanakāryapravṛtyuttarameva kriyāyoganimittopasargasaṃjñakasya sambandhaucityāt/
GS24paribhsu:870: ata eva“suṭ kātpūrvaḥ“iti sūtre“pūrvaṃ dhāturupasargeṇa“ityuktvā 'naitat sāram,
GS24paribhsu:876: evañcāntaraṅgatarārthatopasarganimittaḥ suṭ sam -- kṛtītyavasthāyāṃ dvitvāditaḥ pūrvaṃ pravartate,
GS24paribhsu:878: ata eva“praṇidāpayati“ityādau ṇatvam 'yadāgamāḥ' iti nyāyena samāhitaṃ bhāṣye/
GS24paribhsu:883: ata eva“na dhātu“iti sūtre“preddhaḥ“ityatra“guṇo bahiraṅgaḥ“iti bhāṣye uktam/
GS24paribhsu:884: kiñca“pūrvamupasargayoge dhātūpasargayoḥ samāse aikasvaryādyāpattiḥ' iti“upapadamatiṅ“iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭam/
GS24paribhsu:890: tiṅi tu 'atiṅ' iti niṣedhānna tatra doṣaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:901: tanna ; viśeṣasya vyāpyatvena vyāpakasyānumānenopasthitāvapi tasya nimittatve mānābhāvenādhikadharmanimittakatvānupapādanāt,
GS24paribhsu:904: yattu matupsūtre bhāṣye“pañca gāvo yasya santi,
GS24paribhsu:909: ukte 'pi hi pratyayārthe utpadyate dvigostaddhito yathā 'pāñcanāpitiḥ' iti pūrvapakṣyuktirbhāṣye/
GS24paribhsu:912: tataḥ 'dvaimāturaḥ' 'pāñcanāpitiḥ' 'pañcasu kapāleṣu saṃskṛtaḥ' ityādau sāvakāśadvigorbahuvrīhiṇā prakṛte paratvāt bādha ityāśayena“naiṣa dviguḥ, kastarhi?
GS24paribhsu:913: bahuvrīhiḥ“iti siddhāntinokte tamavakāśamajānāno 'pavādatvād dviguḥ prāpnoti pūrvapakṣī/
GS24paribhsu:914: anyapadārthe subantamātrasya vidhīyamāna bahuvrīheḥ saṅkhyāyāstaddhitārthe vidhīyamāno dvigurviśeṣavihitatvād bādhakaḥ prāpnotīti kaiyaṭaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:934: kintvastiśabdānmatubarthamiti tvadabhimataṃ bahiraṅgatvamapi dvigornāstīti pratipādya siddhāntinā“matvarthe dvigoḥ pratiṣedho vaktavyaḥ“iti vacanenaitatsiddhamityuktam/
GS24paribhsu:935: ata eva“tadoḥ saḥ sāvanantyayoḥ“iti sūtre 'nantyayoriti caritārtham/
GS24paribhsu:936: anyathā pratyaya sāmānyāpekṣatvenāntaraṅgatvādantyasyātve 'nantyasyaiva satve siddhe tadvaiyyarthyaṃ spaṣṭameva/
GS24paribhsu:938: bhāṣyakaiyaṭayorapyetadantaraṅgatvābhāva eva sūcita iti sudhiyo vibhāvayantu/
GS24paribhsu:947: tatkrameṇaiva ca tadbodhakaśabdhapradurbhāvaḥ kalpita iti tatkrameṇaiva tatkāryāṇīti 'paṭvyā' ityādāvantaraṅgatvāt pūrvaṃ pūrvayaṇādeśaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:948: parayaṇādeśasya bahiraṅgatayāsiddhatvādityanena“acaḥ parasmin“iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭam/
GS24paribhsu:954: ata eva vāyvorityādau valilopo yaṇaḥ sthānivatvena vāritaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:956: krameṇānvākhyāne tūktodāharaṇe pūrvapravṛttikatvamantaraṅgatvaṃ bahiraṅgasyāsiddhatvamapi nimittabhāvādaprāptirūpaṃ bodhyam/
GS24paribhsu:965: iyaṃ cottarapadādhikārasthabahiraṅgasya nāsiddhatvabodhiketi“ica ekāco 'm“iti sūtre bhāṣye
GS24paribhsu:973: nanvevam 'akṣadyūḥ' ityādau bahiraṅgasyoṭho 'siddhatvādantaraṅgo yaṇ na syāt, ata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:977_0: anyathā 'adhītya 'pretya' ityādau samāsottaraṃ lyappravṛtyā pūrvaṃ samāse jāte tatra
GS24paribhsu:978: “padadvayasambandhivarṇadvayāpekṣaṃ bahiraṅgam“iti 'preddhaḥ' ityādau guṇo bahiraṅga iti granthena“na dhātu lopa“iti sūtre“saṃyogāntasya lopaḥ“iti sūtre ca bhāṣye spaṣṭam/
GS24paribhsu:982: tanna, iṇaḥ pūrvapadasambandhitvena ṣatvasyāpi padadvaya sambandhivarṇadvayāpekṣatvenobhayoḥ samatvāt/
GS24paribhsu:985: paribhāṣārthastu -- aco 'nyānantaryanimittake 'ntaraṅge kartavye jātasya bahiraṅgasya bahiṣṭva prakḷptiḥ/
GS24paribhsu:990: 'asiddhaṃ bahiraṅgam' ityuktvā 'nājānantarya iti vakṣyāmi' iti bhāṣyāktyā tatratyasya antaraṅga ityasyānuvṛttisūcanāt/
GS24paribhsu:993: 'jātasya bahiraṅgasya' ityuktyā 'ajaye indram' 'dhiyati' ityādau bahiraṅgadīrgha guṇāderasiddhatvaṃ siddham/
GS24paribhsu:997: taddhi 'śivaaāaiha' iti sthite paramapi savarṇadīrghaṃ bādhitvā dhātūpasargakāryatvenāntaraṅgatvād guṇe vṛddhibādhanārtham/
GS24paribhsu:998: nanu“akṣadyūḥ“ityatra yaṇi kṛte ūṭho 'siddhatvād valilopāpattiriti vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:999: aco 'nyānantaryanimittake 'ntaraṅge kartavye kṛte ca tasminyadantaraṅgaṃ prapnoti,
GS24paribhsu:1001: asiddhaparibhāṣāyā anityatvena tadvāraṇe tvasyā vaiyarthyaṃ tenaiva siddheḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1002: ata eva“na lopaḥ sup“iti sūtre kṛti tuggrahaṇaṃ caritārtham/
GS24paribhsu:1003: anyathā 'vṛtrahabhyām' ityādau bahirbhūtabhyāmnimittakapadatvāśrayatvena bahiraṅgatayā nalopasyāsiddhatvena siddhestadvaiyarthyaṃ spaṣṭameva/ mama tu
GS24paribhsu:1012: ata eva“acaḥ parasmin“iti sūtre bhāṣye 'paṭu ī ā' ityatra parayaṇādeśasya anayāsiddhatvāt pūrvayaṇādeśaḥ sādhitaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1013: ata evaiṣā bhāṣye punaḥ kvāpi nollikhitā/
GS24paribhsu:1014: ata eva antaraṅgaparibhāṣāmupakramya vipratiṣedhasūtre 'syā bahūni prayojanāni santi,
GS24paribhsu:1021: nanvevam 'gomatpriyaḥ' ityādau padadvayanimittakasamāśritatvena bahiraṅgaṃ lukaṃ bādhitvāntaraṅgatvāddhalṅyādilope numādayaḥ syuḥ, ata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:1023: antaraṅgānapi vidhīn bahiraṅgo lug bādhate // Paribh_52 //
GS24paribhsu:1025: 'tvatkṛtam' ityādau lugapekṣayā antaraṅgatvād vibhaktinimittakena“tvamāvekavacane“ityanena siddha idaṃ vyarthaṃ sattajjñāpakam/
GS24paribhsu:1037: iti nyāyenāsiddhavatsūtrasthabhāṣyasammatena maparyantasyaivādeśe siddhe tadanuvṛttirvyattheti vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:1049: bhāṣyakārastu vināpi virodhaṃ satyapi sambhave bādhakatvamicchati,
GS24paribhsu:1051: tathāpi yuṣmakādyā'deśavidhānajñāpita utsargaḥ svīkriyata eveti prakṛte na doṣaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1054: tatra ca antaraṅgatvāt tvamāvityeva siddhe vyarthā saṃtajjñapikā/
GS24paribhsu:1055: jñāpite tvasminnetadviṣaye tavādīnāmaprāptyā tadapavādatvābhāvena maparyantasyavā'deśārthaṃ sā caritārtheti tadāśayaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1056: yattu haradattenāntaraṅgapravṛttau pratyaya uttarapade ca maparyantāsambhavena tadanuvṛttirvyarthā satī jñapiketyuktam,
GS24paribhsu:1063: ādye 'he trapu' ityādāvanena nyāyena lopaṃ bādhitvā lug bhavatīti bhāṣye
GS24paribhsu:1068: pañcakhaṭvaḥ' ityādāvekādeśāt prāgeva ṭāpo luk/ anyathā
GS24paribhsu:1069: kṛtaikādeśasya lukyakāraśravaṇaṃ na syāditi kaiyaṭe uktam/
GS24paribhsu:1070: etadvirodhād yat“tadrājasya“iti sūtre kaiyaṭenoktam ' aṅgānatikrānto 'tyaṅgaḥ' ityatra
GS24paribhsu:1071_0: supoluki bahuvacana paratvābhāvāt “tadrājasya“iti lug na syāditi śaṅkāparabhāṣyavyākhyāvasare
GS24paribhsu:1071_1: antaraṅgānapīti nyāyenāyaṃ luk subluko bādhakaḥ syādityāśaṅkya subluka evānena balavatvaṃ
GS24paribhsu:1072: lugapekṣayā luko balavatvasya vaktumaśakyatvāditi tadā śaṅkā samādhānaṃ vaktuṃ yuktam/
GS24paribhsu:1073: anena nyāyenāntaraṅganimittavināśakalukastatprayojakasamāsādīnāṃ ca prābalyaṃ bodhyata ityanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:1080: anyathā 'khaṭvābhiḥ' ityādāvapi pūrvāntavatvenādantatve bhisa aisāpattiriti bhāṣye spaṣṭam/
GS24paribhsu:1087: marudādibhirindrasya dvandve indrasyaiva pūrva nipātaḥ, ata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:1090: atra ca“nendrasya“iti niṣedha eva jñāpaka iti“antādivacca” “vipratiṣedhe param“iti
GS24paribhsu:1093: prasthāya' ityādāvantaraṅgatvādvitvādiṣu kṛteṣu lyap syādata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:1096: “ado jagdhiḥ“iti sūtre ti kitītyeva siddhe lyabgrahaṇamasyā jñapakamiti“ado jagdhiḥ“ityatra bhāṣye spaṣṭam//
GS24paribhsu:1097: nanvevamapi“iyāya“ityādau dvitve kṛte 'ntaraṅgatvāt savarṇadīrghatve tadasiddhirata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:1107: 'yenanāprāpti' nyāyena 'iyati' ityādisakalalakṣya prāpta yaṇapavādatvasyaiva nirṇayāditi prāñcaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1111: “dvirvacaneci“iti rūpātideśenāpahāre dvitve kṛte punaḥ prāpte guṇavṛddhī bādhitvāntaraṅgatvāt savarṇadīrdhāpatteḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1123: antye dvitīyadvirvacanasyaiva satvena tvadukta prayogasyaiva durlabhatvāt/
GS24paribhsu:1125: yadyapi bhāṣye 'yadayamabhyāsasyāsavarṇa ityasavarṇagrahaṇaṃ karoti' iti granthenāsavarṇagrahaṇasyaiva
GS24paribhsu:1127: tathāpi 'na hyantareṇa guṇavṛddhī asavarṇaparābhyāso bhavati' iti tadupapādana granthena sampūrṇa sūtrasyaiva jñāpakatā labhyate/
GS24paribhsu:1129: atyarthametat syāt' ityanena sūtra sārthakyameva darśitam/
GS24paribhsu:1130: asavarṇagrahaṇasyaiva jñāpakatve tu tadvyāvartyapradarśanena tat sārthakyameva darśitaṃ syāt/
GS24paribhsu:1133: guṇaḥ syāditi sambhāvanāyāḥ satvena paribhāṣāpravṛtteḥ sūpapādatvāditi kathaṃ sampūrṇa sūtrasya jñāpakateti vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:1137: na cāntaraṅgatvād dīrdhopi 'iyāya' ityādau pūrvāntavatvenābhyāsatvādivarṇatvācca ṇalyasavarṇa iyaṅvidhānena sūtraṃ caritārtham/
GS24paribhsu:1149: tatra kartavye vṛddhyādeḥ sthānivatvena 'asavarṇe' iti pratiṣedhāditi vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:1153: ata eva 'ārati' ityādau yaṇādeśasya sthānivatvādabhyāsasya“ḍhralope“iti dīrdho durlabha ityapāstam/
GS24paribhsu:1160: anyathāntaraṅgatvāt pūrvaṃ tukaḥ śādeśe tuko 'prāptyā tadvaiyarthyaṃ spaṣṭamevetyanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:1162: tataḥ samprasāraṇe 'pīṭaḥ śravaṇāpattiriti cet, atra kecit--
GS24paribhsu:1168: bahiraṅgeṇāntaraṅgasya nimittavināśe paścāt sambhāvite 'ntaraṅgaṃ neti yāvat/
GS24paribhsu:1173: anyathāntaraṅgatvād dīrdhe kṛta eva pratyayaprāptyā tadvyarthatā spaṣṭa eva/
GS24paribhsu:1174: na cātraikādeśapravṛtti samaye vṛddhyaprāptyaikādeśe kṛta ādeśe vṛddheḥ praptāvapi tannimittavināśābhāva iti vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:1176: na ca sautthitau bahiraṅgatayā vṛddherasiddhatvānna tannimittavināśa iti vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:1180: tanna, asiddha paribhāṣāyā samakālaprāpta bahiraṅgasya pūrvaṃ jātabahiraṅgasya cāntaraṅge kartavye 'siddhatvaṃ bodhyate,
GS24paribhsu:1181: na tu jāte 'ntaraṅge tasya tatva bodhyate,
GS24paribhsu:1187: ata eva 'gomaddaṇḍī' ityādau halṅyādi lopo na/
GS24paribhsu:1188: anyathā halṅyādi lopa kāle sāmāsika luko 'prāptyā taduttaraṃ cāpahāryābhāvādaprāptyā lopasyaivāpatteḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1193: anyathā dīrīghābhāve lopasambhāvanayaitatparibhāṣābalāt dīrghāprāptau tadvaiyarthyaṃ spaṣṭamevetyāhuḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1194: “samarthānām“iti sūtre kaiyaṭastu samarthavacaneneyaṃ paribhāṣā jñāpyate“akṛtavyūhāḥ pāṇinīyāḥ“iti/
GS24paribhsu:1195: tena 'papuṣaḥ' itiyādāvantaraṅgātpūrvaṃ kṛto 'pīḍāgamo nivartata iti vadan 'na kṛto vyūhaḥ viśiṣṭastarko nimittakāraṇavināśe 'pi kāryasthitirūpo yaiḥ' ityarthamabhipraiti/
GS24paribhsu:1199: tathā hi loke nimittaṃ dvividhaṃ dṛṣṭam--kāryasthito niyāmakaṃ tadaniyāmakaṃ ca/
GS24paribhsu:1202: vedānti naye prārabdhasya vikṣepasthiti niyāmakatvaṃ ca prasiddhameva/
GS24paribhsu:1206: bhāvinimittavināśe pūrvamanutpattau tu na kaścinnyāyaḥnāpi sampratipanno dṛṣṭāntaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1207: samarthānāmityasyāpi lokasiddhārthajñāpanena cartārthyasambhave lokasiddhāpūrvatādṛśārthajñapakatve mānābhāva iti tadāśaya iti bodhyam/
GS24paribhsu:1208_0: pare tu 'seduṣaḥ' ityādau padāvadhike 'nvākhyāne 'sed vas as' iti sthite iṭ samprasāraṇayoḥ
GS24paribhsu:1208_1: praptau pratipadavidhitvāt pūrvaṃ samprasāraṇe valāditvābhādiṭaḥ prāptireva neti
GS24paribhsu:1211: tathāpi pūrvapravṛttau sāvakāśatve 'pi niyāmakaṃ bhavatyeveti tadāśayaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1213: “samarthānām“iti sūtrasthasamarthagrahaṇaṃ tu 'viṣuṇaḥ' ityādāvakṛtasandheḥ pratyayadarśanena sarvatra tathā bhramavāraṇāya nyāyasiddhārthānuvāda eva/
GS24paribhsu:1217: kiñca vibhajyānvākhyāne 'su utthita as i' it sthite 'vārṇādāṅgaṃ balīyaḥ' iti prāpta vṛddhi
GS24paribhsu:1219: ata eva“asiddhavat“sūtre 'vasusamprasāraṇamajvidhau siddhaṃ vaktavyam' 'papuṣaḥ' ityādau vasoḥ
GS24paribhsu:1220: samprasāraṇe kṛte āto lopo yathā syāt' iti bhāṣye uktam/
GS24paribhsu:1221: padasya vibhajyānvākhyāne pūrvoktakaiyaṭarītyā pūrvaṃ samprasāraṇe iṭoprāptāvusnimittaka evā'to lopa iti tadasaṅgatiḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1225: asyāṃ paribhāṣāyāṃ satyāṃ tu tadvaiyarthyaṃ spaṣṭameva/
GS24paribhsu:1226: ata eva“chvoḥ“iti sūtre 'avaśyamatra tugabhāvārtho yatnaḥ kāryaḥ' antaraṅgatvāddhi tuk prāpnoti' iti bhāṣye uktam/
GS24paribhsu:1232: taduktam“asiddhavat“sūtre kaiyaṭena 'nimittāpāye naimittikasyāpyapāyaḥ' iti paribhāṣāyāḥ 'bhaṣyakṛtānāśrayaṇāt' iti/
GS24paribhsu:1234: tato gacchatītyādi sambandhe 'hariḥ gacchati' ityādyeva sādhu/
GS24paribhsu:1239: yena nāprāpte yo vidhirārabhyate sa tasya bādhako bhavati // Paribh_57 //
GS24paribhsu:1246: ata eva“āyādayaḥ“iti sūtre 'gopāyiṣyati' ityādāvāyādīn bādhitvā paratvāt syādayaḥ prāpnuvantītyāśaṅkya“anavakāśāḥ āyādayaḥ“'gopāyati' ityādāvapi śap syādiḥ prapnoti/
GS24paribhsu:1247: na ca sati śapyasati vā na viśeṣaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1249: yaduktam“āyādīnāṃ syādibhiravyāpto 'vakāśa iti sa nāstyavakāśa“iti bhāṣye uktam/
GS24paribhsu:1250: evamatra tatpravṛtyuttaraṃ cāritārthye 'pi tadavyāpto 'vakśo nāstīti samameva/
GS24paribhsu:1256: yathā vā'derapi pravṛtyā caritārthena 'ādeḥ parasya' ityanena 'alo 'ntyasya' ityasya bādhaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1257: taduktam“midaco 'ntyāt“iti sūtre bhāṣye“satyapi sambhave bādhanaṃ bhavati“iti/
GS24paribhsu:1259: takraṃ kauṇḍinyāya“ityatra takradānena dadhidānasya bādho na syāt/
GS24paribhsu:1262: ata evācirādeśena nuṭo 'pyapavādatvāt bādhamāśaṅkya 'na tisṛ' iti jñāpakena samāhitam“tṛjvat” sūtre bhāṣye/
GS24paribhsu:1263: tena viṣayabhede 'pavādatvābhāva eva bodhyata iti kaścit,
GS24paribhsu:1273: tasya bādhako bhavati ityevātra paribhāṣārūpeṇa paṭhyate//
GS24paribhsu:1274: yattu 'dayaterdigi' iti sūtre dvitvottaraṃ digyādeśasya cāritārthyaṃ kaiyaṭenoktam,
GS24paribhsu:1278: virodhasya tadbījatvāt“iti vārtikamataṃ tu bhāṣyakṛtā dūṣitatvānna lakṣyasiddhyupayogi/
GS24paribhsu:1279: “takrakauṇḍinya“nyāyopi tadaprāptiyogye 'caritārthaviṣayo vidheyaviṣaya eva ceti“taddhiteṣvacāmādeḥ” “dhātorekācaḥ“ityādi sūtreṣu bhāṣye spaṣṭam/
GS24paribhsu:1282: na hi yāḍādiṣu kṛteṣu ṅerām prapnoti,
GS24paribhsu:1284: tatra svasya pūrvaṃ pravṛttirityeva teṣāṃ bādhaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1285: tatra bādhake pravṛtte yadyutsargaprāptirbhavati tadā bhavatyeva/
GS24paribhsu:1288: yathā 'paceyuḥ' ityādau dīrghavādhake niravakāśa iyādeśe dīrghābhāvaḥ//
GS24paribhsu:1298: kiṃ tarha? anavakāśatvāditi granthena gaṇarūpābhyāsāntyaṇasyetvamityarthe halādiḥśeṣa tannivṛttau tadanavakāśam,
GS24paribhsu:1302: tasmiṃśca sati lope kṛte sāmarthyācchiṣṭasyāntyasyetvamiti na doṣaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1306: tatra hi 'ajjhana' iti dīrdheṇa guṇottaraṃ phalābhāvenānavakāśatvād guṇo bādhite dīrghottaraṃ guṇaḥ syāt,
GS24paribhsu:1307: dīrghavidhānaṃ tu minoterdīrdhe kṛte“sani mīmā“ityatra mīgrahaṇena grahaṇer'thavattatra paścāt praptaguṇabādhanārtham,
GS24paribhsu:1309: anyathāpavādatvena bādhe tadviṣaye utsargāpravṛtterbhāṣyasya sūtrasya cāsaṅgatiriti spaṣṭameva/
GS24paribhsu:1315: atredaṃ bodhyam -- 'yenanāprapte' ityatra yenetyasya yadi svetareṇetyarthaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:1316: tadā sva viṣaye svataradyadyat prāpnoti tad bādhyam,
GS24paribhsu:1326: tatra kāryeṇetyarthe pararūpatvavacchinne kātya ārabhyamāṇāyā vṛddhestadbādhakatve na nirṇīte kiṃ śāstravihitasyetyevaṃ tadviśeṣacintāyāmāha --
GS24paribhsu:1330_0: avaśyaṃ svaparasmin bādhanīye prathamopasthitānantarabādhena cāritārthye paścādupasthitasya
GS24paribhsu:1330_1: tataḥ parasya bādhe mānābhāva ākāṅkṣāyā nivṛttervipratiṣedhaśāstrabādhe mānābhāvāccetyetasya bījam //
GS24paribhsu:1344: anantarasya vidhirvā bhavati pratiṣedho veti // Paribh_61 //
GS24paribhsu:1349: madhye 'pavādanyayāpekṣayānantarasyeti nyāyaḥ prabala iti“aṣṭābhyaḥ“iti sūtre kaiyaṭaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1358: sthānivatvābhāvādādeśo na syāditi tadvaiyarthyāpattiḥ, ata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:1361: lakṣaṇaikacakṣuṣako hyapavādaviṣayaṃ paryālocya tadviṣayatvābhāvaniṣcaya utsargeṇa tattallakṣyaṃ saṃskaroti/
GS24paribhsu:1364: 'apavādo yadyanyatra caritārthaḥ' iti nyāyasya tu nātra praptiḥ,
GS24paribhsu:1366: lakṣyaikacakṣuṣkastu tacchāstra paryālocanaṃ vināpyapavādaviṣayaṃ parityajyotsargeṇa lakṣyaṃ saṃskaroti,
GS24paribhsu:1372: ata eva prātipadikārtha sūtre bhāṣye“idaṃ dvayapyuktvā na kadācittāvadutsargo bhavati,
GS24paribhsu:1377: yattvabhyastasaṃjñāsūtre kaiyaṭena prakalpya ceti pratīkamupādāya yathā 'na samprasāraṇa iti parasya yaṇaḥ pūrvaṃ samprasāraṇam,
GS24paribhsu:1389: dhvanitaṃ cedam“ikoguṇa“iti sūtre bhāṣya iti bhāṣyapradīpodyote nirūpitam/
GS24paribhsu:1390: atra 'devadattasya hantari hate devadattasyonmajjanaṃ na' iti nyāyasya viṣaya eva nāsti/ hate
GS24paribhsu:1399: ye pratipadaṃ vidhīyante te bādhakā bhaviṣyanti' ityāśaṅkya,
GS24paribhsu:1400: 'anavakāśā hi vidhayo bādhakā bhavanti samāsāntāśca kababhāve sāvakāśāḥ' ityuktam/
GS24paribhsu:1401: kvacidanavakāśatvābhāve 'pi paranityādisamavadhāne śīghropasthitikatvena pūrvapravṛttiprayajakaṃ balavatvaṃ pratipadavidhitvenāpi,
GS24paribhsu:1402: paranityāntaraṅgapratipadavidhayo virodhisannipāte teṣāṃ mithaḥ parabalīyastvamiti“pratyayottarapadayośca“iti sūtre kaiyaṭena pāṭhāt/
GS24paribhsu:1403: ata eva 'rame' ityādaupratipadoktatvāt pūrvametva ākārapraśleṣāddhalṅyādilopo na prāpnotītyāśaṅkya“eṅhrasvāt“iti lopena samāhitam//
GS24paribhsu:1404: nanu 'ayaje indiram' ityādāvantaraṅgasyāpi guṇasyāpavādena savarṇa dīrghema bādhaḥ syāt, ata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:1408: evañca prakṛte 'ntaraṅgeṇa guṇena savarṇadīrghaḥ samānāśraye caritārtho yaṇguṇayorapavādo 'pi bādhyate/
GS24paribhsu:1413: kambalaḥ kauṇḍinyāya' ityādau kambaladānena na dadhidānabādha iti“chvoḥ“iti sūtre kaiyaṭaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1415: nanu 'ajīgaṇat' ityādau gaṇerītvaṃ niravakāśatvāddhalādiḥśeṣaṃ bādheta, tatrāha :-
GS24paribhsu:1419: anyathā 'yaṃyayamyate' ityatra nuki kṛte 'najantatvād dīrghāprāptyā tadvaiyarthyaṃ spaṣṭameva/
GS24paribhsu:1424: yattu yatraikaikapravṛtyuttaramapi sarveṣāṃ pravṛttistatraivedamityataḥ“eka“iti sūtre kaiyaṭaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:1425: tanna ; nuki kṛte itvāprāptyā“guṇo yaṅlukoḥ“iti sūtrasthabhāṣyoktatadudāharaṇāsaṅgateścetyanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:1436: kamanā' ityādyasiddhiḥ“namikampi“iti reṇa“anudāttetaśca halādeḥ“iti yuco bādhāditi cet,
GS24paribhsu:1440: 'īṣatpānaḥ somo bhavatā' ityatra khal prāpnotītyata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:1445: tatra hi cakārasamuccitaliṅā kṛtyatṛcorbādho mā bhūditi kṛtyatṛjgrahaṇaṃ kriyata ityanyatra vistaraḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1453: anyathā“parokṣe liṭ“iti liṭā laṅaḥ samāveśo 'sārūpyāt siddha iti kiṃ laṅvidhānena?
GS24paribhsu:1454: śatrādibhistiṅāṃ samāveśārthaṃ śatṛvidhāyake vibhāṣāgrahaṇānuvṛttiḥ“liṭaḥ kānajvā“iti vāgrahaṇaṃ ca kṛtam/
GS24paribhsu:1455: tajjñapayati“vāsarūpa“sūtre 'pavāda ādeśatvānākrāntaḥ pratyaya eva gṛhyata iti kaiyaṭādau dhvanitam/
GS24paribhsu:1456: tatphalaṃ tu sadādibhyo bhūtasāmānye liṭaḥ kvasureva,
GS24paribhsu:1458: nanu“ṅamo hrasvāt“ityādau ṅamaḥ parasyāco 'ci parato ṅama iti veti sandehaḥ syāt, ata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:1461: acīti saptamīnirdeśasya“mayauño“ityuttaratra cāritārthyāt pañcamīnirdeśo 'navakāśa iti“tasmādityuttarasya“ityasyaiva pravṛttiḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1467: āditi pañacamī“ājjaserasuk“ityatra caritārtheti spaṣṭam“tasminniti“iti sūtre bhāṣye kaiyaṭe ca//
GS24paribhsu:1471: nanu“ataḥ kṛkami“iti satvam 'ayaskumbhī' ityatra na syāt kumbhaśabdasyaivopādānāt, ata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:1474: sāmānyarūpeṇa viśeṣarūpeṇa vā prātipadikabodhakaśabdagrahaṇe sati liṅgabodhaka pratyaya viśiṣṭasyāpi tena grahaṇaṃ bodhyam/
GS24paribhsu:1476: asyāśca jñāpakaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇādhikārasthe“kumāra śramaṇādibhiḥ“iti sūtre strīliṅgaśramaṇādiśabdapāṭhaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1484: samāsasaṅghātagrahaṇeṣu ca na pravartata iti ṅyāp sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭam/
GS24paribhsu:1491: doṣāḥ khalvapi sākalyena parigaṇitāḥ' iti bhāṣyokteḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1495: nadyantānāṃ yaḥ samāsa ityarthena ca parihṛtam/
GS24paribhsu:1497: na ; anayā paribhāṣayā strīpratyaya samabhivyāhāre tadrahite dṛṣṭānāṃ prātipadikatva tadvyāpya dharmāṇāṃ viśiṣṭe 'pi paryāptatvamatidiśyata ityāśayāt//
GS24paribhsu:1498: nanvevam 'yūnaḥ paśya' ityatreva 'yuvatiḥ paśya' ityatrāpi“śvayuvonām“iti samprasāraṇaṃ syāt,
GS24paribhsu:1511: nanu“bhaśādibhyo bhuvyacveḥ“ityādau vidhīyamānaḥ kyaṅ 'kva divā bhṛśā bhavanti' ityatrāpi syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1514: nañyuktamiva yuktaṃ ca yat kiñcid dṛśyate tatra tasmād bhinne tatsadṛśe 'dhikaraṇe dravye kāryaṃ vijñāyate/
GS24paribhsu:1516: na hi 'abrahmaṇamānaya' ityukte loṣṭamānīya kṛtī bhavati/
GS24paribhsu:1521: ata eva 'akartari ca' iti sūtre kāraka grahaṇaṃ bhāṣye pratyākhyātamiti bodhyam/
GS24paribhsu:1526: kaccapī' ityādau subantena samāsāt tato 'pyantaraṅgatvāṭṭāp adantatvābhāvājjāti lakṣaṇo ṅīṣ na syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1530: “upapadam“iti sūtre 'tiṅgrahaṇena“kugati“ityatra tadapakarṣaṇenātiṅantaśca samāsa ityarthāt tayoḥ sūtrayoḥ supsupetyasya nivṛtyaikadeśānumatyā kārakāṃśe ca siddheyam/
GS24paribhsu:1537: ata eva 'kumbhakāraḥ' ityādau ṣaṣṭhī samāso 'pi subutpatteḥ pūrvameva/
GS24paribhsu:1538: ṣaṣṭhīsamāsābhāve copapadasamāsakṛta ekārthībhāva iti na tatra vākyamiti bhāṣye spaṣṭam/
GS24paribhsu:1540: athavā 'vibhāṣā ṣaṣṭhī samāso yadā na ṣaṣṭhīsamāsastadopapadasamāsaḥ' iti tatpratyākhyānaṃ ca/
GS24paribhsu:1543: 'athavā' ityādi bhāṣyaṃ paribhāṣāyāṃ sāmānyataḥ kārakopādānena kārakavibhaktyantena kṛdbhiḥ samāsamātrasya subutpatteḥ pūrvameva lābhāt/
GS24paribhsu:1547: nanu“ugidacām“ityatra dhātoścedugitkāryaṃ tarhyañcatereveti niyamenādhātoreva numi siddhe 'dhātugrahaṇaṃ vyartham, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1563: nanu“vadaḥ supi kyap ca“iti cenānukṛṣṭasya yataḥ“bhuvo bhāve“ityatrāpyanuvṛttiḥ syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1571: ata eva“tṛtīyā ca hoḥ“ityatra cānukṛṣṭāyā api dvitīyāyā“antarāntareṇa“ityatra sambandhaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1576: tatra 'cenāpyanukṛṣṭasya kho 'nyatarasyām' ityasya cānuvṛttiṃ svīkṛtya lukkhau ceti bhāṣye pratyākhyātam//
GS24paribhsu:1577: nanvanudāttāderantodāttācca yaducyate tadvyañjanādervyañjanāntācca na prāpnotītyata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1595: nanvevamapi 'rājadṛṣat' itiyādau“samāsasya“ityantodāttatvaṃ ṣakārākārasya na syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1605: nanu“pūraṇa guṇa“iti niṣedhastavyatyapi syāt“diva aut“itiyautvaṃ diveḥ kvipyapi syāt,
GS24paribhsu:1606: tathā“yato 'nāvaḥ“iti svaro ṇyatyapi syāt“ṛdṛśo 'ṅi guṇaḥ“iti caṅyapi syāt; ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1613: nañaḥ parasya yayadantasyottarapadasyānta udātta iti tadarthaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1616: tanmātrānubandhakagrahaṇe sa cānyaścānubandho yasya tadgrahaṇaṃ netyantyārthaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1620: yenānubandhena sānubandhakatvaṃ dvyanubandhakatvādi vā tadanuccāraṇe evaiṣā,
GS24paribhsu:1622: tena“jaśśasoḥ“ityatra naiṣeti niranubandhakatvāt taddhitaśata evātra grahaṇaṃ syāditi na śaṅkyam/
GS24paribhsu:1625: ekānubandhakagrahaṇe sambhavatīti tvartho na bhāṣyādisammata ityanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:1626: nanu 'kuṭīraḥ' ityādau svārthikatvāt svārthikānāṃ prakṛtito liṅgavatanānuvṛtternyāyaprāptatvāt puṃstvānupapattiḥ,
GS24paribhsu:1631: anyathā“karmavyatihāre ṇac striyām“iti striyāmeva vidhānāt kiṃ tena?
GS24paribhsu:1633: nanu 'supathī nagarī' iti“yuvoranākau“iti sūtrabhāṣyodāhṛte“inaḥ striyām“iti kap syāt ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1639: nanu 'śatāni' ityādau numi kṛte ṣaṭsaṃjñā prāpnoti,
GS24paribhsu:1649: ata evātra sannipātaśabdena na pūrvaparayoḥ sambandha eva,
GS24paribhsu:1651: ata eva 'grāmaṇi kulam' ityādau napuṃsakahrasvatve 'pi“piti kṛti“iti tuk na/
GS24paribhsu:1659: -- 'na hi pratyayaḥ pūrva para sannipāta nimittakaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:1660: sa eva ca sannipāta śabdena gṛhyata iti matvā na pratyayaḥ sannipātanimittakaḥ iti śaṅkāyāṃ tadabhyupetyaivāṅgasaṃjñā tarhyanimittaṃ syādityekadeśinoktam' iti na tadbhāṣyavirodhaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1663: vainateyaḥ' ityādāvapyaṅgasaṃjñāyā lopanimittatvānāpatyā varṇāśraya ityasya vaiyarthayam/
GS24paribhsu:1672: na ca yañāditvasāpekṣadīrghasya bahiraṅgatayāsiddhatvānnātra sannipātavighāta iti vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:1674: kiñcāntaraṅge kartavye bahiraṅgasyāsiddhatve 'pi tatra kṛte tasyāsiddhatve mānābhāḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1684: ata eva 'dākṣiḥ' ityatrākārāntaprakṛtīñsannipātanimittāṅgasaṃjñānayā paribhāṣayāllopasya nimittaṃ na syādityāśaṅkyānityatvena samāhitam,
GS24paribhsu:1703: asyā anityatve phalāni bhāṣye parigaṇitāni - varṇāśrayaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:1716: nanu 'pañcendrāṇyo devatā asya pañcendraḥ' ityādau“dvigorluk“ityaṇo luki“lukstaddhita” iti strīpratyayalukyānukaḥ śravaṇāpattiḥ, ata āha -
GS24paribhsu:1719: atra ca“bilvakādibhyaśchasya luk“iti sūtrasthaṃ chagrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam/
GS24paribhsu:1720: taddhi chamātrasya lugbodhana dvārā kuko 'nivṛttiryathā syādityartham/
GS24paribhsu:1721: kṛta kugāgamānaḍādyantargatā bilvādaya eva tatra nirdiṣṭā bilvakādiśabdena/
GS24paribhsu:1725: lakṣaṇapratipadoktaparibhāṣayā bilvādipuraskāreṇa vihitapratyayasyaiva lugvidhānānnātiprasaṅga iti vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:1730: ṭilopenaiva ṅīpi nivṛtte 'sanniyogaśiṣṭa' paribhāṣayā tasyāpi nivṛtyā 'etayati' ityādisiddhau puṃvatvavaiyarthyaṃ spaṣṭameveti“ṭeḥ“iti sūtre kaiyaṭaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:1733: 'aineyaḥ śyaineyaḥ' ityādi tu sthānivatvena siddhamityanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:1734: nanu 'curā śīlamasyāḥ sā caurī'ityādau śīlam“chatrādibhyo ṇaḥ“iti ṇe ṅīp na prāpnotītyata
GS24paribhsu:1747: 'dhātoḥ svarūpagrahaṇe tatpratyaye kāryavijñānam' iti pāṭhastu 'prasṛḍbhiḥ' ityādau“anudāttasya cardupadhasya“ityāmāpādanena bhāṣye dūṣitaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1754: iccakaiḥ' ityādau sarvanāvyayasaṃjñe na syātām, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1758: 'tadekadeśabhūtaṃ tadgrahaṇena gṛhyate' iti“yena vidhiḥ“iti sūtre bhāṣye pāṭhaḥ//
GS24paribhsu:1759: nanu“gātisthāghupābhūbhyaḥ“iti sico luk 'apāsīta' ityādau pāterapi syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1762: asyāñca jñāpakaḥ“svarati sūti“iti sūtre sūṅiti vaktavye sūtisūyatyoḥ pṛthaṅnirdeśa iti
GS24paribhsu:1767: tadupāderniṣedhaḥ“vibhāṣā gamahanavidaviśām“iti sūtre 'śavikaraṇasya gpahaṇaṃ lugvikaraṇaścāyam' ityuktam/
GS24paribhsu:1774: kaṇṭhatastu bhāṣye eṣā kvāpi na paṭhitā/
GS24paribhsu:1775: 'gātisthā' iti sūtre 'pibatergrahaṇam kartavyam' iti vārtikakṛtā 'sarvatraiva pāgrahaṇe 'lugvikaraṇasya gpahaṇam' iti bhāṣyakṛtā coktam/
GS24paribhsu:1777: nanu 'prajighāyayiṣati' ityādau“heracaṅi“iti vidhīyamānaṃ kutvaṃ na syāt ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1784: nanu 'yuṣmabhyam' ityādau 'bhyasaḥ' ityatra bhyamiti cchede bhyaso bhyami kṛte 'ntyalope etvaṃ syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1788: tasmin sati punaranyasyāṅgakāryasya vṛttau pravṛttāvavidhānaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1790: anyathekāralopena“akṛsārva“iti dīrgheṇa ca siddhe tadvaiyarthyaṃ spaṣṭameva/
GS24paribhsu:1791: ata eva“jñājanorjā” “jyādādīyasaḥ“iti sūtrayorenāṃ jñāpayitvā kiṃ prayojanamiti praśne pibaterguṇapratiṣedha uktaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:1796: “śeṣe lopaḥ“cāntyalopa eva“ato guṇe“iti pararūpeṇa siddham 'yuṣmabhyam' ityanyatra nirūpitam/
GS24paribhsu:1797: evañca sūtradvayasthametajjñāpanaparaṃ bhāṣyam“bhyaso bhyam“iti sūtrasthaṃ ca bhāṣyamekadeśyuktirityāhuḥ//
GS24paribhsu:1807: tathā tanādipāṭhādeva siddhe“tanādikṛñbhyaḥ“iti sūtre kṛñ grahaṇāt --
GS24paribhsu:1815: tathā vinārtha nañā samāsena“anudāttam padamanekam“ityeva siddhe varjagrahaṇāt --
GS24paribhsu:1826: ata eva“ghorlopo liṭi vā“it sūtre veti pratyākhyātam/
GS24paribhsu:1829: āgamaśāstrasyānityatve tvāṭyasati 'dadhāt' ityasiddhyā vāgrahaṇasyāvaśyakatvena tatpratyākhyānāsaṅgatiḥ spaṣṭaiva/
GS24paribhsu:1842: yadapi -- nanu hanterayaṅlukyāśīrliṅi vadhādeśo na syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1845: ṣāṣṭadvitvasya dviḥprayogasiddhāntena prayogadvayarūpe samudāye prakṛtirūpatvabodhanenedaṃ nyāyasiddham/
GS24paribhsu:1846: ata eva juhudhītyadau dvitve kṛte dhitvasiddhiriti/
GS24paribhsu:1848: kiñca tena siddhantena pratyekaṃ dvayostatvabodhane 'pi samudāyasya tatvabodhane mānābhāvaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1849: ata eva“dayaderdigi“iti sūtre 'steḥ paratvād dvitve kṛte parasyāsterbhūbhāve pūrvasya śravaṇaṃ prāpnotītyāśaṅkya viṣayasapmyāśrayaṇena parihṛtaṃ bhāṣye/
GS24paribhsu:1850: anyathā tvaduktarītyā 'ekājdvirvacana' nyāyena samudāyasyaivādeśāpattau tadasaṅgatiḥ spaṣṭaiva/
GS24paribhsu:1852: “bhūsuvoḥ“ityasya tadantāṅgasyetyarthāt prāptasya guṇaniṣedhasya bobhūtviti niyama iti na tadvirodhaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1857: anūdyamāna viśeṣaṇeṣu tanniyāmikā paribhāṣā nopatiṣṭata ati tadarthaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1860: kiñca“udīcāmātaḥ sthāne“iti sūtre sthāne grahaṇamasyā liṅgam/
GS24paribhsu:1867: paribhāṣālabhya ityarthasya“ṣaṣṭī sthāne“iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭamuktatvena tvaduktajñapakāvambhavācca/
GS24paribhsu:1871: nanu 'namaskaroti devān' 'namasyati devān' ityādau“namaḥ svasti“it caturthī durvārā, ityata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1875: tacca prathamāyā apyastīti sāpi kārakavibhaktiriti“sahayukte“ityādisūtreṣu bhāṣye dhvanitam/
GS24paribhsu:1877: ata eva“yasyaca bhāvena“iti saptamyapekṣayādhikaraṇasaptamyā balavatvamanena nyāyena,
GS24paribhsu:1884: “namo variva“itisūtre 'namasyati devān' ityādau caturthī vāraṇāya bhāṣye upanyāsasyāsaṅgateśca//
GS24paribhsu:1886: upapadārthena tu yatkiñcit ktiyākārakamūlakaḥ sambandha iti tannimittā vibhaktirbahiraṅgetyapāstam,
GS24paribhsu:1888: atra ca namaḥ padārthasyāpi kriyātvaṃ muṇḍayatau muṇḍasyeva/
GS24paribhsu:1889: “sahayukte“ityādau ca pradhāne prathamā sādhanārthamiyaṃ bhāṣya upanyastetyanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:1890: nanu 'adamuyaṅ' ityādau pūrvasyāpi muktvāpattiḥ, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1899: ata eva vidhdha ityādyartham“na samprasāraṇe“iti caritārtham/
GS24paribhsu:1902: na caiṣā“ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇam“iti sūtre bhāṣye pratyākhyāteti bhramitavyam,
GS24paribhsu:1907: tatra vṛddheḥ pūrvamantaraṅgatvāt dvitve paratvādabhyāsakārye tato 'bhyāsekārasya vṛddhivāraṇāyāvaśyakī/
GS24paribhsu:1910: yattu“na samprasāraṇe“iti sūtre bhāṣye 'naitasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni' ityuktam/
GS24paribhsu:1914: etasyāḥ prayojanāni' iti pāṭho 'pi kvacid dṛśyate/
GS24paribhsu:1916: spaṣṭā ca“ṣyaṅaḥ“iti sūtre“adaso 'seḥ“iti sūtre ca 'kecidantyasadeśasya' ityanena bhāṣya ityanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:1935: nanu svasrāditvaprayukto mātṛ śabdasya ṅībniṣedhaḥ paricchettṛvācakamātṛśabde 'pi syāt,
GS24paribhsu:1947: nanu vātāyanārthe gavākṣe 'vaṅo vaikalpikatvāt 'gokṣaḥ' ityādyapi syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1951: “śācchoḥ“iti sūtre“laṭaḥ śatṛ“ityādi sūtreṣu ca bhāṣye spaṣṭā//
GS24paribhsu:1954: niyame hyaśrutāyā anyanivṛtteḥ sāmarthyāt parikalpanamuktānuvādadoṣaśceti lāghavād vidhireveti bodhyam/
GS24paribhsu:1956: nanu“āśaṃsāyāṃ bhūtavacca“ityanena luṅa iva laṅliṭorapyatideśaḥ syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1965: nanu“titsvaritam“iti svaritatvam 'cikīrṣati' ityādau syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1969: varṇagrahaṇe ca na pravartata iti tatraiva
GS24paribhsu:1972: pare tu“titsvaritam“iti sūtra eṣā paribhāṣā lakṣyasaṃskārāya bhāṣye kvāpi nāśriteti kaiyaṭenoktam/
GS24paribhsu:1976: nanu“viparābhyāṃ jeḥ“ityātmanepadaṃ 'parāsenā jayati' ityarthake 'parājayati senā' ityatra
GS24paribhsu:1980: tena viśabdasāhacaryādupasargasyaiva parāśabdasya grahaṇamiti tatraiva bhāṣye spaṣṭam/
GS24paribhsu:1986: tatra hi“pañcamyapāṅparibhiḥ“iti sūtreṇa lakṣaṇādidyotakapariyoge pañcamīmāśaṅkya 'yadyapyayaṃ parirdṛṣṭāpacāro varjane cāvarjane ca,
GS24paribhsu:1992: tena hi sadṛśānāmeva prayoge sahāyabhāvo bādhitaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1993: “dvistriścatuḥ“iti sūtre sāhacaryeṇaiva kṛtvor'thasya grahaṇe siddhe kṛtvorthagrahaṇādeṣānityā/
GS24paribhsu:2003: nāṅgasya śiśīlugnumvidhiṣu tu gṛhyamāṇasyābhāvāt prakaraṇaprāptaṅgasyaiva viśeṣaṇam/
GS24paribhsu:2004: ata eva“vā napuṃsakasya“iti sūtre“vā śau“iti na kṛtam/
GS24paribhsu:2005: tatra napuṃsakagrahaṇaṃ hi gṛhyamāṇasya śatrantasyaiva napuṃsakatve yathā syāt,
GS24paribhsu:2006: 'bahavo dadato yeṣu tāni kulāni bahudadati' ityatra mā bhūt;
GS24paribhsu:2007: 'bahūni dadanti yeṣu te bahudadantaḥ' ityatra yathā syādityevamartham/
GS24paribhsu:2009: kecittu“aco rahābhyaṃ dve“ityatra śrutena rephasya nimittatvena yarantarbhāvādanumitena kāryitvaṃ bādhyata ityetadudāharaṇamāhuḥ,
GS24paribhsu:2015: tathā“gātisthāghupābhūbhyaḥ“iti luk 'pai ovai śeṣaṇe' ityataḥ kṛtātvāt parasyāpi syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:2028: tattu tasminneva sūtre śabdenduśekhare dūṣitamiti tata eva draṣṭavyam/
GS24paribhsu:2030: nanvevaṃ deṅo dodhātośca kṛtātvasya ghusaṃjñā na syāt,
GS24paribhsu:2031: tathā meṅa ātve 'praṇimātā' ityādau“nergadanada“iti ṇatvaṃ na syāt,
GS24paribhsu:2032: tathā 'gai' ityasyātve“ghumāsthā“itītvaṃ na syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:2037: anyathā lākṣaṇikatvādeva vidhau tadgrahaṇe siddhe kiṃ niṣedhe sāmānyagrahaṇārthena pitvena?
GS24paribhsu:2041: “gātisthā“iti sūtre iṇādeśagāgrahaṇameveṣyata iti na doṣa ityanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:2045: nanvevaṃ saṃyogasaṃjñāsamāsasaṃjñābhyastasaṃjñā api pratyekaṃ syuḥ, ā āha --
GS24paribhsu:2049: arthinaśca rājāno hiraṇyāna bhavanti' ityādau daṇḍanavat/
GS24paribhsu:2051: nanu“yūstriyākhyau“ityatra vyaktipakṣe dīrghanirdeśādanaṇtvena grāhakasūtrāprāptyodāttādyanyatamoccāraṇe 'nyasvarakasya saṃjñā na syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:2054: asati yatne svarūpeṇoccārito guṇo na bhedakaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:2058: nanu 'sarvanāmāni' ityatra ṇatvābhāvanipātane 'pi loke saṇatvaprayogasya sādhutvaṃ syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:2062: “purāṇaprokteṣu“iti nipātitapurāṇaśabdena purātana śabdasya bādhaḥ prāpto 'pi pṛṣodarāditvānneti bodhyam/
GS24paribhsu:2065: na caivamasthayādīnāṃ“nabviṣayasya“ityādyudāttatayāntyādeśasyānaṅaḥ sthānyanurūpe 'nudātta evoccāraṇīya udāttoccāraṇaṃ vivakṣārthaṃ bhaviṣyatīti kathamasya jñāpatvamiti vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:2070: sahasya sa udātto nipātyate“ityādi bhāṣyaṃ tvekaśrutyāṣṭādhyāyīpāṭhe kvacidudāttādyu
GS24paribhsu:2072: “traisvaryeṇa pāṭhaḥ“iti pakṣe tu jñāpakaparaṃ bhāṣyāmiti kaiyaṭādayaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:2073: pare tu, nipātanaṃ nāmānyādṛśe prayoge prāpte 'nyādṛśaprayogakaraṇam,
GS24paribhsu:2077: atra vikārakṛto lakṣyabhedo neti“sici vṛddhiḥ“iti bhāṣyāt pratīyate/
GS24paribhsu:2084: nanūkhadhātordvitve svata eva hrasvatvāt pūrvamabhyāsahrasvāprāptau halādiḥ śeṣe savarṇa dīrghe hrasvāpattiḥ, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:2087: evaṃ ca hrasvasyāpi hrasve kṛte 'lakṣye lakṣaṇasya' iti nyāyena na punarhrasvaḥ/ taduktam
GS24paribhsu:2088: “iko jhal“iti sūtre bhāṣye -- 'kṛtakāri khalvapi śāstraṃ parjanyavat' iti/
GS24paribhsu:2090: na ca 'lakṣye lakṣaṇasya sakṛdeva pravṛttiḥ' ityatra na mānamiti vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:2091: “samovālopameke“iti lopenaikasakārasya dvitvena dvisakārasya punardvitvena ca trisakārasya siddhau“samaḥ suṭi“iti sūtrasyaiva mānatvāt,
GS24paribhsu:2098: vidheyāṇ viṣaye tu“apratyayaḥ“iti niṣedhānna guṇābhedakatvena savarṇagrahaṇam,
GS24paribhsu:2099: ata eva 'ghaṭavat' ityādau matormasya nānunāsiko vakāraḥ/
GS24paribhsu:2110: anyathā mīmāṃsakarītyā vidherupajīvyatvena prabalyāt tasya sarvathā bādhānupapatyā durvāraḥ sa iti mañjūṣāyāṃ vistaraḥ/
GS24paribhsu:2118: so 'pi pratyaya ityasyāpyaṅgīkārāt tasya pratyayatvamiti na doṣaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:2140: droḍhā droḍhā' ityādau ghatvādīnāmasiddhatvāt pūrvaṃ dvitve ekatra ghatvam,
GS24paribhsu:2148: 'kṛṣṇarddhiḥ' ityādau jaśtvātpūrvamanantaraṃ vā dvitve rūpe viśeṣābhāvena nāsyāḥ pravṛttirityanyatra vistaraḥ/
GS24paribhsu:2150: nanu 'goṣvaśveṣu ca svāmī' ityādivat 'goṣvaśvānāṃ ca svāmī' ityapi syāt“svāmīśvara“iti sūtreṇa ṣaṣṭhīsapmyorvidhānāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:2152: ekasyā ākṛteścaritaḥ prayoge dvitīyasyāstṛtīyasyāśca na bhaviṣyati // Paribh_126 //
GS24paribhsu:2153: yatrānyākṛtikaraṇe bhinnārthatvasambhāvanā tadviṣayo 'yaṃ nyāya ityantra vistaraḥ/
GS24paribhsu:2155: nanu 'vivyādha' ityādau paratvāddhalādiḥśeṣe vasya samprasāraṇaṃ syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:2157: samprasāraṇaṃ tadāśrayaṃ ca kāryaṃ balavat // Paribh_127 //
GS24paribhsu:2159: vastutaḥ“liṭyabhyāsasya“iti sūtre 'ubhayeṣāṃ grahaṇasyobhayeṣāṃ samprasāraṇameva yathā syādityarthakatvenedaṃ siddhamityeṣā vyarthā,
GS24paribhsu:2162: “ṇau ca saṃścaṅoḥ“ityādau saṃścaṅoḥ ityādi viṣayasaptamīti tatrāpi na doṣa ityanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:2174: 'na ca vikṛtiḥ prakṛtiṃ gṛhṇāti' iti“grahijyā“iti sūtrasthabhāṣyeṇādyāyāstiraskārācca/
GS24paribhsu:2180: 'iha hi vyākaraṇe sarveṣveva sānubandhakagrahaṇeṣu rūpamāśrīyate -- yatrāsyaitadrūpamiti,
GS24paribhsu:2182: tasmiṃśca laukike prayoge sānubandhakānāṃ prayogo nāstīti kṛtvā dvitīyaḥ prayoga upāsyate,
GS24paribhsu:2183: 'ka upadeśo nāma' iti ghusaṃjñāsūtrastha bhāṣyeṇa prāyogikāsambhave tadgrahaṇamityarthasya lābhena bhāṣyāsammatā ca /
GS24paribhsu:2185: “dādeḥ“iti sūtre dādipadasyaupadeśikadāditvavati lakṣaṇeti na doṣa ityanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:2186: yadapi nanu 'ajarghā bebhidīti' ityādau tattadiguṇaprayuktā vikaraṇā yaṅluki syuḥ,
GS24paribhsu:2187: tathā yaṅluki 'bebhiditā' ityādau“ekācaḥ“itoṇ niṣedhaḥ syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:2189: śtipā śapānubandhena nirdiṣṭaṃ yad gaṇena ca /
GS24paribhsu:2190: yatraikājgrahaṇaṃ caiva pañcaitāni na yaṅluki // Paribh_130 //
GS24paribhsu:2199: ata eva“śvoditaḥ“iti sūtre kaiyaṭe -- 'yatraikāj grahaṇaṃ kiñcit' iti pāṭhaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:2209: ata eva 'jāgaritavān' ityādāvupadeśa ugantatvamādāya“śruyukaḥ kiti“itīṇ niṣedho na/
GS24paribhsu:2211: na ca bhāṣye yaṅ lopo 'bebhiditā' ityādāviṭpravṛtyarthamupadeśe 'nudāttādekācaḥ śrūyamāṇādaṅgādityarthe sanīṭpratiṣedho vaktavyaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:2214: kiñca, tasya tadviṣayakatve yaṅlope sthānivatvasyevayaṅlukyupāyāpradarśanena nyūnatpattiriti vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:2215: iḍviṣaye yaṅluko loke 'nabhidhānena chandasi sarvavidhīnāṃ vaikalpikatvena ca tatra doṣānupanyāsenādoṣāt/
GS24paribhsu:2216: anyathā 'ekājgrahaṇaṃ kimartham' iti praśnasya 'uttaratra jāgartyarthamiha vadhyartham' ityuttarasya ca bhāṣye nirālambhanatvapatteḥ/
GS24paribhsu:2223: aṅgatvaṃ tu viśiṣṭa eveti“ekāco dve“iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭam/
GS24paribhsu:2226: ata eva“ekāco baśo bhaṣ“iti sūtre dhātoravayavasyaikāca iti vaiyadhikaraṇyenānvaye gardhapsiddhiḥ prayojanamuktaṃ bhāṣye,
GS24paribhsu:2228: 'ajarghāḥ, bebhidīti' ityādau śnam śyanādayastu“carkarītaṃ ca“ityasyādādau pāṭhena
GS24paribhsu:2242: tatra ca inādeśe ikārapratyākhyānaṃ yogavibhāgenaiva kṛtamiti bahavaḥ//
GS24paribhsu:2249: tatra hi sūtre algrahaṇahalgrahaṇayorviśeṣavicāre saṃjñāyāṃ halgrahaṇam“ṇyakṣatriya“iti sūtre aṇiñoriti vācyamiti trīṇi padānyalgrahaṇe,
GS24paribhsu:2250: tadekaṃ svādilope halgrahaṇam“ṇya“iti sūtre aṇiñoriti na vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:2251: apṛktasyeti vācyamiti trīṇyeva padānīti nāsti lāghavakṛto viśeṣa ityuktam/
GS24paribhsu:2252: “aci śnu“iti sūtre iṇa ityeva siddhe yvoriti saṃmṛdya grahaṇānna pūrveṇeṇgrahaṇam/ tatra
GS24paribhsu:2253: vibhakti nirdeśe saṃmṛdya grahaṇe ca sārdhāstrisro mātrā iṇ grahaṇe tisro mātrā iti laṇsūtre bhāṣyokteḥ,
GS24paribhsu:2256: tatrāyamarthaḥ --“ṣṭhivuklamu“iti sūtre 'śitīti na karttavyaṃ bhavati' iti bhāṣye na kevalaṃ mātrālāghavaṃ yāvadayamapyartha iti kaiyaṭokteḥ prāyeṇeti śivam//
